mapper.select:
SELECT
1=1
and CONCAT(`F_MODULE_TYPE`,'##',`F_DESCRIPTION` ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by F_CHDATE
mapper.sql: F_MODULE_TYPE,F_TYPE_CODE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_POINT_AMOUNT, F_POINT_TYPE_CL, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) F_CRDATE, date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) F_CHDATE
mapper.insert:
insert into bes_module_type
F_MODULE_TYPE,
F_DESCRIPTION,
F_POINT_AMOUNT,
F_POINT_TYPE_CL,
F_CRDATE,
F_CHDATE,
#{fModuleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPointAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fPointTypeCl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fCrdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fChdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update bes_module_type
F_DESCRIPTION = #{fDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_POINT_AMOUNT = #{fPointAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_POINT_TYPE_CL = #{fPointTypeCl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_CRDATE = #{fCrdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
F_CHDATE = #{fChdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where F_MODULE_TYPE = #{fModuleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bes_module_type set F_DESCRIPTION = #{fDescription}, F_POINT_AMOUNT = #{fPointAmount}, F_TYPE_CODE = #{fTypeCode}, F_POINT_TYPE_CL = #{fPointTypeCl}, F_CRDATE = current_timestamp(), F_CHDATE = current_timestamp() where F_MODULE_TYPE = #{fModuleType}
mapper.select: select f_id ,f_modulepoint_type from bes_modulepoint_type order by f_id
SELECT max(CAST(F_ID as SIGNED)) as maxId FROM bes_module_type
